# Ruttansh (0xRutts)

> Ruttansh, also known as Rutts or 0xRutts, is a Toronto-based AI Engineer and ML Researcher. This is his personal portfolio site.

## About

Ruttansh builds production-ready AI/ML tooling that bridges rigorous research with practical engineering across security, code intelligence, and automation. His current work centers on vulnerability-aware copilots, RAG-enhanced workflows, and inference/training pipelines that prioritize reliability and observability. He holds an Honours BSc in Computer Science (Data Analytics).

## Current Role

- AI Engineer & ML Researcher at [CredShields](https://credshields.com/) (Apr 2025 -- Present)
  - LLM-assisted pipelines for smart contract vulnerability detection
  - RAG workflows and knowledge bases for actionable copilots
  - Fine-tuned PyTorch/Hugging Face models for few-shot vulnerability analysis

## Previous Roles

- Machine Learning Researcher at [TELUS](https://www.telus.com/en) (Jan 2025 -- Apr 2025)
- Full Stack Developer at [McMaster University](https://www.mcmaster.ca/) (Sep 2024 -- Dec 2024)
- Machine Learning Researcher at [Osteoporosis Canada](https://osteoporosis.ca/) (May 2024 -- Aug 2024)
- Freelance Full Stack Developer (Dec 2023 -- May 2024)

## Skills

- Languages: Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Solidity, Rust, C#, R
- AI/ML: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face, Transformers, Unsloth, vLLM, DeepSpeed, Pandas, NumPy
- Full Stack: React, Next.js, Node.js, Express, FastAPI, Django, Flask, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Flutter
- Infra: AWS, Google Cloud, Azure, Docker, Git, Vercel, Linux, Nginx

## Projects

- [Loan Referral Automation](https://github.com/rutts29/loan-referral-automation): Automated a 40-50 min manual loan-deal workflow to under a minute with AI-assisted deal submission (TypeScript, Next.js, Docker)
- [Keyed](https://github.com/rutts29/Keyed): Decentralized social media on Solana with AI-powered content discovery (TypeScript, Rust, Python, Solana, PostgreSQL)
